General.Name: Transaction Capital
General.Description: Transaction Capital Limited provides a range of business services in South Africa. The company operates through three segments: SA Tax, Nutun, and Webuycars. It acts as a principal in acquiring and then collecting on non-performing loan portfolios, or as a service provider on an outsourced contingency or fee-for-service basis. The company also offers capital-enabled services and capital-light customer experience management services; operates a mobility platform, which includes minibus taxi ownership, vehicle procurement, repossession and refurbishment, asset-backed and unsecured vehicle finance, insurance, maintenance, telematics, vehicle tracking, and other allied services; and buys, retails, and distributor vehicles. Transaction Capital Limited was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.
